title: President Donald J. Trump Signs S. 782 into Law – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Infrastructure & Technology	

Issued on:
November 2, 2017
On Thursday, November 2, 2017, the President signed into law:
S. 782, the “Providing Resources, Officers, and Technology to Eradicate Cyber Threats to (PROTECT) Our Children Act of 2017” which reauthorizes, through fiscal year 2022, the National Internet Crimes Against Children Task Force Program.
